text: Natalia Yurievna Nikonorova (Russian: Никонорова Наталья Юрьевна); Ukrainian: Никонорова Наталія Юріївна; born on September 28th, 1984) is a politician who was the Permanent Representative of the unrecognised Donetsk People's Republic at the negotiations of the tripartite contact group in Minsk and head of the interdepartmental committee for the accreditation of humanitarian missions. == Biography == Natalia's mother is the long-time head of the election headquarters of Alexander Ryzhenkov, the president of Donetsk Metallurgical Plant (Donetsk Metallurgical Plant) for the elections to the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine, and also the late Tamara Yegorenko, the chairman of the Lenin district executive committee of Donetsk (this district executive committee was headed by Alexander Ryzhenkov to Yegorenko), Yuri Ryzhenkov, general director of Metinvest, the central company of Rinat Akhmetov (formerly Yuriy held a position financially then Director), "he wrote. == References == Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:People of the Donetsk People's Republic
title: Nataliya Nikonorova
